name: CKEDITOR.template
doc:
Lightweight template used to build the output string from variables.

// HTML template for presenting a label UI.
var tpl = new CKEDITOR.template( '<div class="{cls}">{label}</div>' );
alert( tpl.output( { cls: 'cke-label', label: 'foo'} ) ); // '<div class="cke-label">foo</div>'

members.name: output
members.doc: Processes the template, filling its variables with the provided data.

params.name: data
params.doc: An object containing properties which values will be used to fill the template variables. The property names must match the template variables names. Variables without matching properties will be kept untouched.

params.name: buffer
params.doc: An array into which the output data will be pushed into. The number of entries appended to the array is unknown.

return.name: return
return.doc: If buffer has not been provided, the processed template output data, otherwise the new length of buffer.

members.short_doc: Processes the template, filling its variables with the provided data. ...

short_doc: Lightweight template used to build the output string from variables. ...
